Articles.Content: So I've been playing around with BDArmory for a while and I'm still working out the links here and there. But there is a problem with the Radar Warning Receiver hud. I click it and it turns on but it's not showing up on my screen the only thing I am getting is a small grey square in the top left corner covering up a part of the time stamp. I tried dragging it down but it doesn't do anything. Is my mod glitched out or is the radar stuck off screen?
